sections.heading: library; use by school districts
sections.text: Any school district may in its discretion at its annual meeting, by a majority vote, authorize the school board to contract for the use of a public library by the inhabitants of such district.SourceLaws 1911, c. 73, ยง 11, p. 317;R.S.1913, ยง 3802;C.S.1922, ยง 3195;C.S.
